medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that the pain started about 2 days ago, predominantly in the left lower quadrant, radiating to the back. The pain became more severe over the following days. She also experienced intermittent diarrhea, with her last bowel movement being nonbloody yesterday evening. Subjective fevers and chills were noted at home. The patient had similar pain about 6 weeks ago that improved without intervention over the course of the week. She has not had prior episodes other than these two.
